title: Open doors ... opportunities in trade training for women
brief_description: Interviews with women apprentices show the opportunities in various trades; they are training to be nursery attendants, motor mechanics, plumbers, refrigeration mechanics, and optical glass makers. They speak about career prospects, work satisfaction and attitudes towards female apprentices. No other credits available.
